languages.text: "И что я скажу маршалу? Что его лучший Арбитес погиб в клоаке? Или что он, забери меня бездна, сделал себе лестницу из трупов со дна этой ямы?"
"And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"
languages.original_text: "И что я скажу маршалу? Что его лучший Арбитес погиб в клоаке? Или что он, забери меня бездна, сделал себе лестницу из трупов со дна этой ямы?"

traits.locale_text: "And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"
"And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"
"And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"
"And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"
"And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"

languages.text: 「それで、将帥には何て言えばいい？彼の最も優秀なアービトレイターはこのみすぼらしい穴蔵で死んだとでも？それとも―地獄に落ちろって感じだが―彼は死体の山を足場にして、この奈落から這い上がったとでも伝えろというのか？」
languages.original_text: "And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"

traits.locale_text: 「それで、将帥には何て言えばいい？彼の最も優秀なアービトレイターはこのみすぼらしい穴蔵で死んだとでも？それとも―地獄に落ちろって感じだが―彼は死体の山を足場にして、この奈落から這い上がったとでも伝えろというのか？」

languages.text: "Und was soll ich dem Marschall sagen? Dass sein bester Arbitrator in diesem Drecksloch gestorben ist? Oder dass er – die Leere soll mich holen – sich aus Leichen eine Leiter gebastelt hat und dann aus dieser Grube geklettert ist?"
languages.original_text: "And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"

traits.locale_text: "Und was soll ich dem Marschall sagen? Dass sein bester Arbitrator in diesem Drecksloch gestorben ist? Oder dass er – die Leere soll mich holen – sich aus Leichen eine Leiter gebastelt hat und dann aus dieser Grube geklettert ist?"

languages.text: « Et qu'est-ce que je dirai au maréchal ? Que son meilleur arbitrator est mort dans cette fange ? Ou que... Le vide m'emporte ! Qu'il a entassé des cadavres afin de s'enfuir de cette fosse ? »
languages.original_text: "And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"

traits.locale_text: « Et qu'est-ce que je dirai au maréchal ? Que son meilleur arbitrator est mort dans cette fange ? Ou que... Le vide m'emporte ! Qu'il a entassé des cadavres afin de s'enfuir de cette fosse ? »

languages.text: «¿Y qué le digo al mariscal? ¿Que su mejor Arbitrator murió como un perro en esta fosa séptica? ¿O que amontonó los cadáveres de sus enemigos para construir una escalera y salir de este agujero?».
languages.original_text: "And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué le digo al mariscal? ¿Que su mejor Arbitrator murió como un perro en esta fosa séptica? ¿O que amontonó los cadáveres de sus enemigos para construir una escalera y salir de este agujero?».

languages.text: “还有，你希望我如何向元帅汇报？你希望我告诉他，他最出色的法务官死在了这个粪坑里？还是说，他用那些渣滓的尸体搭了个梯子，从粪坑里爬出去了？”
languages.original_text: "And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"

traits.locale_text: “还有，你希望我如何向元帅汇报？你希望我告诉他，他最出色的法务官死在了这个粪坑里？还是说，他用那些渣滓的尸体搭了个梯子，从粪坑里爬出去了？”

languages.text: "Peki Miralay'a ne söylemeliyim? Elindeki en iyi Yargıcı'nın bu lağım çukurunda öldüğünü mü? Yoksa kendisine cesetlerden bir merdiven yapıp bu çukurdan çıktığını mı?"
languages.original_text: "And what do I tell the Marshal? That his top Arbitrator died in this squalid hole? Or that he — void take me — fashioned himself a ladder of corpses and climbed out of this pit?"

traits.locale_text: "Peki Miralay'a ne söylemeliyim? En iyi Yargıcısının bu lağım çukurunda öldüğünü mü? Yoksa uçsuz beni alsın kendisine cesetlerden bir merdiven yapıp bu çukurdan çıktığını mı?"
